  • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.barcodes.AssignReadGroupByBarcode 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    protected static final java.lang.String SUMMARY "Assigns the read groups present in the file(s) based on the barcode present in the raw barcode tag(s). Read groups are assigned by matching the ones provided in the barcode file against the present in the tag(s), allowing mismatches and unknown bases (Ns) in the sequence.\n\nFind more information about this algorithm in http://magicdgs.github.io/ReadTools/AssignReadGroupByBarcode.html"

"

  • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.conversion.ReadsToFastq 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    protected static final java.lang.String SUMMARY "Converts SAM/BAM/CRAM/FASTQ formats into FASTQ, including information from the barcodes (BC tag) in the read name (Illumina format) to allow keeping sample data.\n\nFind more information about this tool in http://magicdgs.github.io/ReadTools/ReadsToFastq.html"
  • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.conversion.StandardizeReads 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    protected static final java.lang.String SUMMARY "Standardizes the format of reads from both raw and mapped reads and outputs a SAM/BAM/CRAM file with:\n\t- Standard quality encoding (Sanger)\n\t- Raw barcode sequence/quality in the correct tags (BC/QT)\n\n\ncorrect tags (BC/QT).\n\nFind more information about this tool in http://magicdgs.github.io/ReadTools/StandardizeReads.html"
  • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap.DownloadDistmapResult 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    protected static final java.lang.String SUMMARY "Download, sort and merge the results for running DistMap (Pandey & Schl\u00f6tterer, PLoS ONE 8, 2013, e72614).\nThis tool scan the folder provided as input for multi-part BAM/SAM/CRAM files (e.g. \'part-*\'), sort and merge them by batches (in the temp directory) and finally merge all the batches into a single output file.\n\nFind more information about this tool in http://magicdgs.github.io/ReadTools/DownloadDistmapResult.html"
  • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.distmap.ReadsToDistmap 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    protected static final java.lang.String SUMMARY "Converts SAM/BAM/CRAM/FASTQ formats into Distmap format (Pandey & Schl\u00f6tterer, PLoS ONE 8, 2013, e72614), including information from the barcodes (BC tag) in the read name (Illumina format) to allow keeping sample data.\n\nFind more information about this tool in http://magicdgs.github.io/ReadTools/ReadsToDistmap.html"
